tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_dependencies (
    dependency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    dependency_course_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dependency_course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Prerequisite (
    prerequisite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    prerequisite_course_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (prerequisite_course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Dependency (
    dependency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    dependent_course_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dependent_course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Course (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  course_description TEXT,
  department_id INT,
  prerequisite_course_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Dependency { 
 dependency_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 course_id INT, 
 dependent_course_id INT, 
 FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id), 
 FOREIGN KEY (dependent_course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id) 
 }

CREATE TABLE StudentCourses { 
 student_id INT, 
 course_id INT, 
 grade TEXT, 
 FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id), 
 FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id) 
 }
